content: Once again, we reported robust results in the quarter and in 2022 at Compass, reflecting the consolidation of ComEd's results and the higher volume of natural gas distributed by Comgas in residential and commercial segments, combined with the effect of inflation adjustment on the margins, which neutralizes the decline in industrial volumes due to the slowdown in the period in line with its planning, Comgas made divestments in some of commits assets in addition to continuing the investments in the final phase of grade identification terminal construction, which should begin operations in the second half of this year.
